name: Crush Me Softly
description:
You are in a sinking submarine.

The only way to not be crushed by the deep blue ocean is to use your mining laser to loot old ship wrecks for plates and resources. How long will you survive bevor the inevitable happens

Controls:

W-A-S-D - to steer the ship

Space - to Fire

left-right key - to swivel the laser

Good luck caPTAIN
